title: IN AHANGAMA On The Beach Villa Sale
details:
This is an ideal place for one who find on the beach villa. A beautiful beach behind the villa and in front of the villa Galle-Matara main road. 12 attached bed and bathrooms with ac and hot water. An ideal beach and ocean panaroma to the villa and bedrooms.restaurants . Daily income resource. NB. If you want to inspection it, please make an appointment with our real estate agent on 0778354380.
Welcome for any foreign investor as well as local..
PRICE REDUCED UPTO RS. 175 million.
